title: Another Help with this font please
content:
Can anyone help with this one ?

Thanks Paula

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820083647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dream%20days_4555.jpg)
author: Style Embroidery

comments.content:
Love these plump fonts. I have seen some that were very close but I can't recall the names.  
Anyway a previous fat fonts thread:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/42643](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820083647/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42643 "http://www.typophile.com/node/42643")  
Don

Try [Sniglet](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820083647/http:/www.dafont.com/sniglet.font). Not identical, but close.  
Don

Congratulations defiantone for finding the match in Tomoyuki Watanabe's Bambina. It's real kawaii!  
Don

Thanks so much, saved me loads of time.

Paula
